org.codehaus.groovy.grails.web.taglib
Interface GrailsTag

All Known Implementing Classes:
GroovyCollectTag, GroovyConditionalTag, GroovyDefTag, GroovyEachTag, GroovyElseIfTag, GroovyElseTag, GroovyFindAllTag, GroovyGrepTag, GroovyIfTag, GroovySyntaxTag, GroovyUnlessTag, GroovyWhileTag, RenderInputTag, RequestContextTag
public interface GrailsTag

An interface that allows to tag implementation to be abstracted from the JSP custom tag spec.. hence allowing them to be used in direct method calls etc.

Since:
11-Jan-2006
Author:
Graeme Rocher
